intent_atoms.description: Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be obtained before importing licensed assets and refreshing regression baselines.
After unblocking, import the licensed assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real-world payloads.
macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture must be available before executing the lenient-versus-strict benchmark.
After unblocking, execute the benchmark with ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES=1073741824, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance/.
FoundationUI Phase 5.2 performance profiling tasks require manual execution with Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine.
After unblocking, publish performance baselines in PERFORMANCE.md.
FoundationUI Phase 5.2 performance benchmarks require multi-platform testing on actual hardware (iOS 17, macOS 14, iPadOS 17).
After unblocking, integrate CI with performance gates.
Cross‑platform testing requires testing on actual devices and simulators across iOS/macOS/iPadOS.
After unblocking, compile test results and create cross‑platform report.
Manual accessibility testing requires VoiceOver and accessibility features testing on real devices.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Media Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H media assets into the system and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export scenarios.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Run a lenient‑vs‑strict performance benchmark on macOS using a 1 GiB payload, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive results in Documentation/Performance.

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish collected performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 into PERFORMANCE.md after profiling or benchmarking tasks are completed.

functional_units.name: Generate Cross‑Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile test results from iOS, macOS, and iPadOS device testing (including dark mode, RTL, locale) into a cross‑platform report.

functional_units.name: Finalize Accessibility Sign‑off
functional_units.description: Complete manual accessibility validation (VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, contrast, etc.) and produce final accessibility sign‑off documentation.
